item.title: EarthLink Means Business With 10 GigE Fiber
item.description: EarthLink, known for its dial-up internet service, has a lesser-known side: EarthLink Business. This division provides fiber optic network solutions for businesses of all sizes, with over 28,000 miles of fiber infrastructure already in place and expanding. They are currently establishing two 10 Gigabit Ethernet fiber rings in Ohio and Eastern Pennsylvania, along with a high-speed fiber route between Philadelphia and Pittsburgh. This growth in high-bandwidth infrastructure is driven by the increasing automation and cloud adoption by businesses.
